rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0001
rows.name: Uka, we've arrived.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, Tora-tan, what are we
doing in a place like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0003
rows.name:
We're going to communicate with
the Divine Beast Tortoga!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0004
rows.name:
Tora-tan, you can talk with
Divine Beasts? That's amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0005
rows.name:
The one who will talk is
not Tora. Uka will too.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0006
rows.name: What!? I can't possibly do that!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0007
rows.name:
I once tried it with Uzushio
in Avaritia, and I nearly
got swallowed whole!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0008
rows.name:
That because Uzushio Divine
Beast only speak Nopon.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0009
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0010
rows.name:
Tortoga here is exposed to the
Superbian language daily.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0011
rows.name:
So if we speak to it in our
language, it will understand us?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0012
rows.name: That's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0013
rows.name:
Tora realized that maybe Uka
hasn't been using the right
language when talking to them.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0014
rows.name: Hmm, I wonder if that was the reason?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0021
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0022
rows.name:
You won't know until
you try. Go for it!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0023
rows.name:
I think feelings are more
important than language.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0024
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0025
rows.name:
You should just try it
and see what happens.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0026
rows.name:
Don't you think what you feel matters
more than the words you use?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0027
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0028
rows.name:
You should try it. What
have you got to lose?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0029
rows.name:
I believe emotions matter
more than words...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0030
rows.name: What should I say to Uka?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0031
rows.name: It's worth a try. Give it a shot.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0032
rows.name:
It's the emotions behind the words
that matter most, don'tcha think?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0101
rows.name:
You're right. I can keep trying
as many times as necessary.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0102
rows.name: Well then, let's begin...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0103
rows.name: Tortoga-san, nice to meet you. I'm Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0105
rows.name:
Are you upset that the Superbian
Empire remodeled you without asking?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0106
rows.name:
It must be awful to be
forced like that...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0107
rows.name:
You'd prefer to live more peacefully,
right? What do you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0108
rows.name:
Looks like it's not
getting through to him...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0109
rows.name:
I don't think it's understanding
what we're saying.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0110
rows.name: I don't think he's getting it.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0111
rows.name: This didn't work, did it?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0112
rows.name: Huh!?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0113
rows.name:
Maybe he can hear me but
just can't answer back?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0115
rows.name:
The Superbian Empire's
terrible technology has
stolen his ability to speak!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0116
rows.name: The Empire will pay for this!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0117
rows.name:
No, no, I don't think
they would go that far.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0118
rows.name: I don't think they would go that far.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0119
rows.name:
That's definitely not what
happened. Trust me, Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0120
rows.name:
He still has his tongue,
and even the Empire wouldn't
be that cruel, ya know?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0121
rows.name: Oh, I guess I was mistaken...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0122
rows.name:
I thought I had gained a hint, but
this time was no good either...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0123
rows.name: Too bad...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0124
rows.name:
And Tora stayed up all night coming
up with this idea just for Uka...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0125
rows.name: Uka, I hope it goes well next time!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0126
rows.name:
Uka, I'm sure someday you'll
be able to converse freely.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0127
rows.name:
Just keep trying. I'm sure
you'll get it eventually, Uka.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0128
rows.name:
With your perseverance, Uka,
you'll definitely be able
to talk to them someday.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0129
rows.name: Thank you all so much!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0130
rows.name:
I couldn't communicate with Tortoga,
but I truly value your support.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0131
rows.name:
I'll keep trying my best to live
up to everyone's faith in me!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0132
rows.name:
And my ultimate goal is to
befriend the Immovable Gonzales
and have a picnic with him!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0133
rows.name: I'll do my best!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0134
rows.name:
This is going to take
quite some time...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0135
rows.name:
A picnic... What kind of food
would she pack for that...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0136
rows.name:
I wonder if my lifespan
will last that long...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0137
rows.name:
Since he's immovable, won't he
be unable to go on a picnic?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0201
rows.name: Oh! A good point...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0202
rows.name:
What matters is the desire to connect!
It's not about technicalities!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0203
rows.name: Let's try asking Saika then.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0204
rows.name: Why?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0205
rows.name:
Saika can call forth the Luxurian
Divine Beast, so she must be able
to communicate with them.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0206
rows.name:
She did make Genbu emerge from
the Cloud Sea. It could work.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0207
rows.name:
That's a good idea. Maybe
we should do it like when
we went to Luxuria.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0208
rows.name:
Interesting... I hadn't
considered that. It's
certainly worth looking into.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0209
rows.name:
That's a brilliant suggestion.
Saika might actually be
able to pull it off.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0210
rows.name:
Saika-san, I'd really
appreciate your help!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0211
rows.name:
Thing is, my abilities might
only work with Genbu, ya know?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0212
rows.name: No, I want to try. Could you teach me?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0213
rows.name: Surer.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0214
rows.name: First, place your hand on your chest.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0215
rows.name:
Then, visualize the Divine Beast
and try speaking to it gently.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0216
rows.name: ...Hello? Can you hear Uka's voice?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0218
rows.name: ...Hello there? Please speak with me!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0220
rows.name: ...You're not hearing anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0221
rows.name: ...There's no response at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0222
rows.name: Eh? ...You can't hear anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0223
rows.name: That's right, I can't hear a thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0224
rows.name:
Perhaps it's because I don't
have ears like Saika-san?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0225
rows.name: Ears?

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0226
rows.name:
Because my ears aren't
pointed like Saika-san's.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0227
rows.name:
I don't think that's related...
But Kaku-tan and Suke-tan's
ears are pointed too.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0228
rows.name: Y-you're right!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0229
rows.name:
They can hear the Divine Beasts
but they're hiding it from me!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0234
rows.name: This is such a betrayal!

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0235
rows.name:
They both seem confused... It
was just a little joke...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0230
rows.name:
*sigh* It looks like Uka
won't be communicating with
animals anytime soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0231
rows.name:
*sigh* I wonder when the
day will come that Uka can
talk with animals...

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0232
rows.name:
*sigh* The day when Uka can
talk with animals seems like
it will be far in the future.

rows.label: kizunatalk071_msg0233
rows.name:
*sigh* When will the day come that
Uka can finally talk to animals...
